metadata.title: CVE-2019-19844 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: Django before 1.11.27, 2.x before 2.2.9, and 3.x before 3.0.1 allowsaccount takeover. A suitably crafted email address (that is equal to anexisting user's email address after case transformation of Unicodecharacters) would allow an attacker to be sent a password reset token forthe matched user account. (One mitigation in the new releases is to sendpassword reset tokens only to the registered user email address.)

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
